text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Loved your fairy tale about how much you did and how right you were about the virus when all you did is criticize everyone else for shutting down. Your VP said it will be gone by Memorial Day instead 100,000 were dead. Telling the truth is foreign to you
https://t.co/RjccCrqIww
